page.title: 19TRANSPORT PRESTON CAPES
page.content:
The area around Preston Capes has a limited Public Bus Service taking passengers to Northampton only. Because of this, a high proportion of families run two or more cars/vehicles. Out of the adult population of l79 _ l09 cars/vehicles are used on a daily basis. There are approx. 4 mopeds/motor bikes in use. A Rural Wheels Scheme operates in the area whereby if anybody needs to attend or visit a Health Centre, Hospital etc. and has no access to a car, the local Co_ordinator will arrange for a car driver to transport them.
This project was compiled by members of Preston Capes Womens Institute.
